2026-0020
2026-01-26ESDCDepartment of Employment and Social Development ActAppointment of a member of the Employment Insurance Board of AppealAppointment of Douglas John Baylee Lloy of Stellarton, Nova Scotia, to be a member of the Employment Insurance Board of Appeal, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of five years, effective January 26, 2026.N/A
act: Department of Employment and Social Development Act
subject: Appointment of a member of the Employment Insurance Board of Appeal
precis: Appointment of Douglas John Baylee Lloy of Stellarton, Nova Scotia, to be a member of the Employment Insurance Board of Appeal, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of five years, effective January 26, 2026.
